Package reskue.culturalasset

Class CulturalAssetService

java.lang.Object
kueres.eventbus.EventSubscriber
kueres.base.BaseService<E,​R>
reskue.ReskueService<CulturalAssetEntity,​CulturalAssetRepository>
reskue.culturalasset.CulturalAssetService
@Service
public class CulturalAssetService
extends ReskueService<CulturalAssetEntity,​CulturalAssetRepository>
The CulturalAssetService provides services needed by the CulturalAssetController.
Since:
Mar 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jan Strassburg, jan.strassburg@student.kit.edu

    • create

      public CulturalAssetEntity create​(CulturalAssetEntity entity)
      Create a CulturalAssetEntity.
      Overrides:
      create in class kueres.base.BaseService<CulturalAssetEntity,​CulturalAssetRepository>
      Parameters:
      entity - - the cultural asset that should be created. This cultural asset can not have an identifier.
      Returns:
      The created cultural asset. This contains the cultural asset's identifier.

    • update

      public CulturalAssetEntity update​(java.lang.Long id, java.lang.String detailsJSON) throws org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException, java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.SecurityException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Update a cultural asset. Fields that are not populated in the updated data will not be changed.
      Overrides:
      update in class kueres.base.BaseService<CulturalAssetEntity,​CulturalAssetRepository>
      Parameters:
      id - - the cultural asset's identifier.
      detailsJSON - - the updated data in JSON format.
      Returns:
      The updated cultural asset.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if there is no cultural asset with the specified identifier.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.SecurityException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.InstantiationException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - if the JSON string can not be processed

    • delete

      public CulturalAssetEntity delete​(java.lang.Long id) throws org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException

      Overrides:
      delete in class kueres.base.BaseService<CulturalAssetEntity,​CulturalAssetRepository>
      Parameters:
      id - - the cultural asset's identifier.
      Returns:
      The cultural asset that was deleted.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if there is no cultural asset with the specified identifier.

    • findInRadius

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<CulturalAssetEntity> findInRadius​(double radius, double longitude, double latitude, kueres.query.EntitySpecification<CulturalAssetEntity> specification, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get all cultural assets in a radius around a given middle point.
      Parameters:
      radius - - the radius of the search.
      longitude - - the longitude of the middle of the search.
      latitude - - the latitude of the middle of the search.
      specification - - filter for the result.
      pageable - - sort and pagination for the result.
      Returns:
      The result as a page.

    • updateIsEndangered

      public void updateIsEndangered​(CulturalAssetEntity entity, int state)
      Updates the endangered state of the cultural asset. This also updates the endangered state of all children below the cultural asset in the hierarchy of cultural assets. This also updates the endangered state of all connected tasks.
      Parameters:
      entity - - the cultural asset.
      state - - the new endangered state of the cultural asset.
